CODIF_DATA.AA_AUTHORITY_TYPE: Ministry or any other national or federal authority
CODIF_DATA.RP_REGULATION: European Economic Area (EEA), with participation by GPA countries
CODIF_DATA.HEADING: 03A02

TITLE.P: E39 Main cycle path — E01 Asser Jåttens veg — Public transport bridge, E03 Løwenstrasse-Smeaheia and E04 Smeaheia-Oalsgate — Contract

SHORT_DESCR.P: The main cycle path is a pilot project by Norwegian standards. It shall go between Stavanger and Sandnes, will only be for cyclists and will be approx. 13 km long.

This competition is for the main cycle path from Asser Jåttensveg to Oalsgata in Sandnes. The stretch between the public transport bridge (Sandnes border) and Løwenstrassekrysset (the Aftenblad building) is still being regulated and is not included.

A contract will be signed for the stretch Asser Jåttensveg to the public transport bridge. The public transport lane and the 2 stages from Løwenstrasse to Smeaheia and Smeaheia — Oalsgate will be options for the builder. I.e. the builder will have the right, but not a duty, to let the tenderer carry out work on these stretches in accordance with the price and terms in the contract. The options must be priced and added to the sum in the evaluation. Any option contract will be signed at a later date.
E01 Asser Jåttensveg — the public transport bridge (Sandnes border), including option 0 public transport lane:

The basis for the project is development plan 2439, adopted by Stavanger municipality on 12.1.2015. The stretch is 3760 m long and goes from profile 1660 at Asser Jåttensveg og to profile 5420 at the Sandnes border (the public transport bridge/ Møller bil) in Stavanger municipality. In addition an arm with a foot and cycle path shall be constructed from the culvert under county road 509 down to the existing foot and cycle path by the public transport axis in Sola municipality.
The contract work includes:
— The main cycle path with an asphalted width of 4 m and 0.25 m shoulder on each side.
— Concrete supporting walls.
— Natural stone supporting walls.
— Noise reduction screens.
— New railings along the E39.
— Bridge by the culvert on Maskinveien.
— Improvements to parts of Maskinveien.
— 6 connections to the main cycle path.
— Alterations to and new installations of cables for the cable departments, primarily Lyse and Telenor.
— Alterations to and new installations of municipal water and sewage pipelines and the accompanying manholes/equipment.
— Surface water management/drainage (sewage pipelines, manholes, retention installations etc. for the Norwegian public roads administration).

— Alterations to IVAR´s sewage pipelines north of Solasplitten. The contract is subject to the required formalities for the sub-stretch closest to the pump station (approx. 230 m) being in place by 1 November. Otherwise this work will be excluded.

— The public transport lane along the E39 from Asser Jåttensveg to Solasplitten and in to Forus is an option for the builder. This will be decided before the contract is signed. It is not deemed to be critical and will not, therefore, affect the completion date for the contract work.
Options, see II.2.11) Information on options.

OPTIONS_DESCR.P: E03 Løwenstrasse to Smeaheia (option for the builder, option 1).
The basis for the project is development plan 2012102, adopted by Sandnes municipality on 18.9.2017. The stretch is 2490 m long and goes from profile 6110 to profile 8600.
The contract work includes:
— The main cycle path with an asphalted width of 4 m and 0.25 m shoulder on each side.
— Concrete supporting walls.
— Natural stone supporting walls.
— Noise reduction screens/noise reduction mounds.
— New railings along the E39.
— Alterations to Stokkaveien at Kvadrat.
— Culvert for connection at Kvadrat.
— Bridge over the ramp to the E39 (the Kvadrat junction).
— Culvert under the ramp from the E39 (the Kvadrat junction).
— 2 connections to the main cycle path and a temporary connection to the south of Løwenstrasse.
— Alterations to and new installations of cables for Lyse and Telenor.
— Alterations to and new installations of municipal water and sewage pipelines and the accompanying manholes/equipment.
— Surface water management/drainage (sewage pipelines, manholes, retention installations etc. for the Norwegian public roads administration).
E04 Smeaheia — Oalsgate (option for the builder, option 2).

The basis for the project is development plan 2015108, adopted by Sandnes municipality on 18.9.2017. The stretch is 960 m long and it starts where the others end. There is a break in the profiling and a new profiling goes from -150 to profile 810.
The contract work includes:
— The main cycle path with an asphalted width of 4 m and 0.25 m shoulder on each side.
— Concrete supporting walls.
— Natural stone supporting walls.
— Noise reduction screens/noise reduction mounds.
— New railings along the E39.
— Alterations to a municipal foot and cycle path at Smeaheia.
— Bridge over a foot and cycle path by Soma bridge.
— Alterations to and new installations of cables for Lyse and Telenor.
— Alterations to and new installations of municipal water and sewage pipelines and the accompanying manholes/equipment.
— Surface water management/drainage (sewage pipelines, manholes, retention installations etc. for the Norwegian Public Roads Administration).

SUITABILITY.P: Tenderers shall be a legally established company.

Documentation requirement: Company registration certificate from a Register of business enterprises foreign tenderers can submit an equivalent certificate in accordance with the legislation in the tenderer's country of establishment.

ECONOMIC_FINANCIAL_INFO.P: The tenderer must have good economic and financial capacity to complete the contract.
There are requirements regarding the tenderers´ equity and total capital. See the tender documentation for detailed information.
Documentation requirement: Annual accounts etc. See the tender documentation for detailed information.

ECONOMIC_FINANCIAL_MIN_LEVEL.P: Equity shall be minimum 10 % of the contract´s annual value, cf. the tender documentation. See the tender documentation for detailed information.

TECHNICAL_PROFESSIONAL_INFO.P: Tenderers shall have sufficient experience with assignments of a corresponding nature and degree of difficulty. NPRA and other builders' experiences with the tenderer will be appraised HSE: Tenderers must have a system for proactive compliance of health, safety and the working environment.

See the tender documentation for further information on the main disciplines in the assignment, and for which other sub-assignments are of significance for the contract work as well as a detailed description of the requirements.
Documentation requirements: See the tender documentation for detailed information.

TECHNICAL_PROFESSIONAL_MIN_LEVEL.P: See the tender documentation for more detailed information.

PERFORMANCE_CONDITIONS.P: C2: Special contractual regulations for construction works, the Norwegian national roads administration.
Form of contract is performance contracting. The contract type is unit price contract.

PLACE.P: The tenders will be opened electronically. Tenderers will not be able to participate in the opening.

INFO_ADD.P: A tender conference will be held on 6.4.2018 from 12:00-15.00. Meet in the meeting room 'Bergeland I', ground floor, Bergelandsgata 30, Stavanger.
